captions.text: [SHINee] Thank you~ thank you for your effort.

[TAE MIN] When we make a comeback,
we hope you love us and cheer us on.
And believe in us. Thank you!

[MIN HO] Right now, we're at our second shooting set. 
We will try our best.

[ONEW] We just finished our fun-fun MV shoot,
so we hope you really-really look forward to it.

[KEY] We will prepare for our album promotion well
so that we can show you our best. Bye~
